channel.title: When i try to complile | Windows 7 | Need urgent help
channel.description:
im using windows 7 and when i try to compile my rsbot it comes up with this btw i wasnt gettin any help at the rsbot site so i thought id try here ..
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/sun/tools/javac/ ain Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.sun.tools.javac.Main at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: com.sun.tools.javac.Main. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

nope its completly different because im compiling scrips.

item.title: When i try to complile | Windows 7 | Need urgent help
item.dc:creator: @imhot123 imhot123
item.description:
@imhot123 wrote:

im not sure if this will work or not but this code works for my mopar server compiler and i run on win 7 maybe it works for ur rsbot? click “EDIT” on your rsbot and paste that in…

@echo off
title Simple Compiler
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Read full topic
